name: Smile - complementary extension
description:
Automatically paste Emojis from the Smile emoji picker

To launch the picker on Super+., you need to configure a keyboard shortcut:

1. Go to Settings
2. Select "Keyboard"
3. Select "View and Customize Shortcuts"
4.Scroll down to "Custom Shortcuts" and click it.
5. Click on the plus sign
6. Choose smile as name
7. Choose "flatpak run it.mijorus.smile" as command (or another command launching smile in your environment)
8. Click on "Set Shortcut...".
9. Press Su√ºer+.
10. Click on "Add".
11. Close all dialogs
12. Super+. should work now
